suite.name: Test Suite Registration Functionality

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

test.name: TC 010

kw.name: Validate all the mandatory fields in the Register Account page are marked with red color * symbol
Varify Mandatory Fields Marked with Red Asterisk
kw.doc: Verify all mandatory field are marked with red coloured asterisk symbol it means user should fill this field compasory to register new user.

kw.name: Click on 'Register' link
kw.doc: User can click on Registration link which is located on header part of home page After clicking on Registration page will open.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get WebElements
kw.doc: Returns a list of WebElement objects matching the ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Element Attribute
kw.doc: Returns the value of ``attribute`` from the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.arg: Field is mandatory and marked with red asterisk
Field is NOT marked as mandatory with a red asterisk
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: Field is NOT marked as mandatory with a red asterisk
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: Field is NOT marked as mandatory with a red asterisk
